tooltip.exdel.ownerizer:
Use me to own a functional block 
and allow some stuff to happen automatically! 
HINT: I allow mystery arrows 
to work with dispensers in GOML/Flan claims
config.exdel.title: Explorer's Delight configuration
config.exdel.general.mystery_arrow.descr: Configure the weight (i.e. relative chance) of each possible action, that a mystery arrow can do. IMPORTANT: To configure which entities mystery arrows affect and which produce, you need to edit the corresponding tags.
